avastAppDesc.message: Pronađite najbolje cijene, ponude i kupone tijekom kupnje putem interneta uz usporedbu cijena i kupone koje omogućuje Avast.

safePriceContinueShopping.description: It is showed to the user on the rating screen to offer the chance of continue purchasing

safePriceEnjoyQuestion_AVG.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceEnjoyQuestion_AVG.message: Uživate u korištenju aplikacije AVG SafePrice?

safePriceEnjoyQuestion_Avast.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceEnjoyQuestion_Avast.message: Uživate u korištenju aplikacije Avast SafePrice?

safePriceLeaveRating.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceLeaveRating.message: Ostavite nam ocjenu da biste pokazali koliko vam se sviđa.

safeShopBestOfferSaving.description: %s will be the saving percentage of the best offer. Ex: SAVE 25%

safeShopPopularHotelIn.description: %s is the price + currency. Example: Popular hotels from 200,00 €

safeShopSimilarHotel.description: %s is the amount of hotels found. Example: 4 similar hotels

sasAdditionalFees.message: Mogu se primjenjivati dodatne naknade i porezi

sasGladYouLike.message: Drago nam je da vam se sviđa!

sasHintBestOfferDesc.message: Idite izravno na najbolju cijenu za ovaj proizvod.

sasOptionsDisableAll.message: Onemogući SafePrice na svim web-mjestima na 24 sata

sasOptionsEnableAll.description: Message that allow the user to enable SP if it was deactivated for 24H for all domains

sasOptionsEnableOnSite.description: Message that allow the user to enable SP if it was deactivated for 24H for one domain. %s: name of the domain

sasPromoDescription_AVG.message: AVG SafePrice pronalazi najbolje ponude za ono što kupujete tako što automatski uspoređuje cijene na webu.

sasPromoDescription_Avast.message: Avast SafePrice pronalazi najbolje ponude za ono što kupujete tako što automatski uspoređuje cijene na webu.

sasRecommendedOfferTitle.message: Ovaj pouzdani prodavač ima dobre cijene, recenzije i kvalitetu usluge.

sasSPTooltipText.message: Vidjet ćete najbolje ponude prilikom pretraživanja omiljenih web-mjesta za kupnju.

sasSorry.message: Žao nam je što to čujemo

sasStartingPrice.description: %s is the minimum value off the price. Example: Starting at: $124.00
